Post.title: 008Days_Day 1
Post._content:
# 
## 
![image](https://i.imgur.com/ia79Zze.png)

* `,,$`
* Javascript ,
* `Reserved Words ` or ` keyword`
* Javascript``
* Javascript``, ,``  `` ,**,**

# 
* ,``
```js
m=1;
console.log(m);//print 1
```
* , `undefined`
```js
var m;
console.log(m);//undefined
```
* `ReferenceError` 

* **var**``**let**
```js
var m = 1;
var m = 2;

let n =3;
let n=4;//Uncaught Syntax Error
```
# 
##  (Primitives)

* String
* Number
* Boolean
* Null
* Undefined
* Symbol `After ES6`

## 
```js
  typeof {}; //object
  typeof []; //object
  typeof null;//object
  typeof window.alert; //function
```
*************************
### String 
* , `\`**Escape Character**
* ,`+`

```js
var str = 'Let\'s go!';

var hello = "Hello"+"World";
```
###  (Template Literal)
* ***`${}`***  & 

```js
var a =5;
var b=15;

console.log(`Fifteen is ${a+b} and not ${2*a + b}`)
```
###  (Number)
* JS,number, 
* Infinity (), -Infinity), NaN(,Not a Number)
1. 0 => `Infinity `
2. 0 => `-Infinity `
3. 0/0, Infinity/Infinity, -Infinity/-Infinity =>`NaN`

#### NaN 
```js
typeof(NaN); //'number'
```
* `NaN``NaN`,,`NaN`
```js
NaN === NaN //false
isNaN("123") //false String Number()
isNaN("NaN")//true "NaN"
```
* ``
```js
0.1+0.2 === 0.3 //false
```
* 

###  (True & False)
* ``,``

### null & undefined
> null  undefined, null`null`, undefined `undefined`
* `Boolean()`Boolean`false`
```js
Number(null);//0
Number(undefined); //NaN
```
>undefined `, `, null``

##  (Object)
>(Primitives), ``

EM

``` ```css .parent1{ font-size:2em; /*32px*/ } .parent1 h2{ font-size:2em;/* 32px*2 =64px*/ } ``` >rem remhtmlem ## em * emfont-sizeem .parent1 h264px,.parent1 h21em64px ```html

EM

``` ```css .parent1{ font-size:2em; /*32px*/ } .parent1 h2{ font-size:2em;/* 32px*2 =64px,*/ margin-bottom:1em;/*64px*1=64px,64pxem*/ } ``` ## em & rem * em:emem * remhtml pxRWD(media queries)
